article_metadata.author: Deanna Kirk, Daily sun

og.description: As the only locally-owned pharmacy in Corsicana, P&S Pharmacy celebrates its 90th year in business with a slew of festivities this week.
og.title: P&S Pharmacy celebrating 90 years
